channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- SamsungVideoPlayer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- SamsungVideoPlayer

item.title: CVE-2024-34672|2024-10-08T13:25:40.797Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsungvideoplayer
item.description: Improper input validation in SamsungVideoPlayer prior to versions 7.3.29.1 in Android 12, 7.3.36.1 in Android 13, and 7.3.41.230 in Android 14 allows local attackers to access video file of other users.

item.title: CVE-2024-34672|2024-10-08T06:30:54.940Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsungvideoplayer
item.description: Improper input validation in SamsungVideoPlayer prior to versions 7.3.29.1 in Android 12, 7.3.36.1 in Android 13, and 7.3.41.230 in Android 14 allows local attackers to access video file of other users.
